description:
Wow! Robert showed up for this shoot eager to do the scene.
He'd been thinking about playing with a guy since doing these videos, but I think Robert is a bit of a romantic. In other words, I think its important for him to know the person he is working with.
Believe it or not, he and Adam have a lot in common. They both are way in to basketball, grew up in the country, and have a lot of similar interests. So I thought I would try something different.
My goal was to get Robert to relax a little bit more, so this time out I put them on a "date". They spent time before the shoot, talking and getting to know each other, ya know, hanging out. The two of them really hit it off.
When it came time to do the scene, Robert was truly eager. I was floored when he started kissing on Adam. (That's a major hurdle for most of these guys!)
This was a such an easy shoot to do, cuz it was like watching two boys hooking up after a date. Adam loves to get fucked, and Robert was digging topping him.
title: Adam & Robert - Wrapped
